title: Fish supper with swede patties
ingredients: ['650g (1lb 7oz) swede, peeled and cut into chunks', '100g (3½ oz) medium oatmeal', 'Salt and black pepper', '2½ tablespoons olive oil', '100g (3½ oz) mushrooms, sliced', '100g (3½ oz) tomatoes, cut in wedges', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', '225g (8oz) halibut, plaice or sole fillets, skinned', 'Creamed horseradish or vegetable chutney to serve']
